title: Biden gives major speech in Poland; says Putin was counting on being able to divide NATO
content:
1. Biden gives major speech in Poland; says Putin was counting on being able to divide NATO  CNBC
  2. Live: Joe Biden delivers speech in Warsaw on efforts to support Ukraine  The Independent
  3. Biden meets with Poland's president, Ukrainian refugees  CBS Mornings
  4. White House insists US troops not going to Ukraine after Biden comments in Poland  Fox News
  5. President Biden meets with Polish President Andrzej Duda | USA TODAY  USA TODAY
contentSnippet:
Biden gives major speech in Poland; says Putin was counting on being able to divide NATO  CNBC
Live: Joe Biden delivers speech in Warsaw on efforts to support Ukraine  The Independent
Biden meets with Poland's president, Ukrainian refugees  CBS Mornings
White House insists US troops not going to Ukraine after Biden comments in Poland  Fox News
President Biden meets with Polish President Andrzej Duda | USA TODAY  USA TODAY

localize.title: バイデン氏がポーランドで主要な演説を行い、プーチンはNATOを分割できることを期待していたと述べた。
拜登在波兰发表重要讲话；称普京指望能够分裂北约组织
